1.title: Thanksgiving and Christ's Supremacy
1.keyEvent: Paul's thanksgiving and Christ's preeminence over creation

2.title: Warning Against False Teachings
2.keyEvent: Exhortation to remain rooted in Christ, warning against heresies

3.title: Christian Conduct and New Life
3.keyEvent: Instructions on holy living and putting on the new man

4.title: Final Instructions and Greetings
4.keyEvent: Exhortations for prayer, wise conduct, and personal greetings
